member.summary: Converts a value.
member.param: The value produced by the binding source.
The type of the binding target property.

member.returns: A converted value. If the method returns null, the valid null value is used.

member.name: P:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.PackIconControlBase.SpinDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration of the spinning animation (in seconds). This will also restart the spin animation.
member.value: The duration of the spin in seconds.

member.summary: Identifies the SpinEasingFunction dependency property.

member.name: P:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.PackIconControlBase.SpinAutoReverse
member.summary: Gets or sets the AutoReverse of the spinning animation. This will also restart the spin animation.
member.value: true if [spin automatic reverse]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.IPackIconCursorExtension.HotSpot
member.summary: Get or set the hot spot point of the cursor (from (0,0) to (255,255)). Default point is upper left corner (0,0)

member.name: P:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.IPackIconCursorExtension.Width
member.summary: Get or set cursor width (1 to 256). Default value is 32

member.name: P:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.IPackIconCursorExtension.Height
member.summary: Get or set cursor height (1 to 256). Default value is 32

member.name: P:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.IPackIconCursorExtension.StrokeBrush
member.summary: Get or set cursor outline color. If not set a black brush will be used.
member.remarks: If you don't want to draw an outline stroke, set property to 0. If you set the property to transparent, the outline will not be drawn, but its thickness will be cut from the fill area.

member.name: P:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.IPackIconCursorExtension.StrokeThickness
member.summary: Get or set cursor outline thickness. Default value is 0.5

member.name: M:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.PackIconCursorHelper.GetCursorGeometry(System.String,System.Windows.Media.TransformGroup,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Get the that will be used to create the cursor
member.param: Transformation group of the icon (we get it from ).
Width of cursor (optional, between 1 and 256, default is 32)
Width of cursor (optional, between 1 and 256, default is 32)
member.returns: A object that contains the icon to be used in the cursor. The has all transformations to be scaled to desired size and aligned to top left corner.

member.summary: Get from a object
member.param: Fill . If not set a white brush will be used.
Outline . If not set a black brush will be used.
Hot spot point of the cursor (from (0,0) to (255,255)). Default is (0,0)
